text: The 2011 Formula Lista Junior season was the twelfth Formula Lista Junior season. It began on 16 April at the Hockenheimring and ended on 25 September at Autodromo Nazionale Monza after twelve races. Philip Ellis won the drivers' championship and Daltec Racing won the teams' championship. ==Teams and drivers== * All cars are powered by BMW engines, and Mygale chassis. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" !
